typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		movie as string,
		title as string,
		genres as string,
		year as string,
		Rating as string,
		{Rotton Tomato} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> moviesOut1
moviesOut1 select(mapColumn(
		movie,
		title,
		genres,
		year,
		{Rotten Tomato} = {Rotton Tomato}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Select1 filter(toInteger(year)>1950) ~> Filter1
Filter1 derive(genre = iif(locate('|',genres)>0, left(genres, locate('|',genres) -1),genres)) ~> genre
genre window() ~> Window1
